# KWAENFInR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of KWAENFInR is to provide functions that simulate financial models which can be used to price derivatives.  

## Installation

You can install the development version of KWAENFInR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("QuinnRamakers/KWAENFInR")
```
